resources.string: The game has three types of berries and a bomb. It is necessary to open all the elements in order to score the maximum number of points and not run into a bomb

The raspberry is a small, soft fruit from the Rosaceae family, native to Europe and northern Asia. It boasts a vibrant red color, a delicate structure composed of multiple drupelets, and a hollow core. Known for its sweet yet tangy flavor, it\'s rich in vitamins and used in a variety of culinary contexts.
